Q-Learning Testing with Maze Environment

2018-02-15
Lirhea
Q-Learning
maze  Q-Learning  DQN  DDQN  DuelingDQN
* content {:toc} #Abstract Reinforcement Learning is an attractive domain. And it got much development in recent years. Here, I would like to solve a maze environment by tabular Q-learning, DQN, Double DQN, and Dueling DQN methods. Furthermore, there is also a comparison among them. # Maze Environment !()[oldmap.png] There is an maze environment, which is designed by @Morvan Zhou. However, it's only 4 girds * 4 girds. And it's too easy to find a way out. I made some noticeable changes: * larger map, which is 20 grids * 20 grids. * more barriers. ![](newmap.png)
